de.propra2.ausleiherino24.propayhandler

Class AccountHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.propra2.ausleiherino24.propayhandler.data.AccountHandler

  • @Service
public class AccountHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    gets Propay account Data, adds and transfers Funds except for reservation punishments.

        Parameters:
        accountName - name of user to be checked
        requestedFunds - amount of requested Funds to be compared with actual free Funds
